title.zh: 线上：《携带者检测援助》项目募资成功
title.en: Online: 'Carrier Testing Assistance' Project Fundraising Success

description.zh: 《携带者检测援助》项目在腾讯公益平台上线仅5天时间，就成功募集到35,000多元善款，超额完成了预期目标。这一成果充分体现了社会各界对血友病女性群体的关注和支持，为后续开展更多血友病女性关爱活动奠定了坚实的资金基础。
description.en: The 'Carrier Testing Assistance' project successfully raised over 35,000 yuan in just 5 days after launching on the Tencent Charity platform, exceeding the expected target. This achievement fully demonstrates the attention and support from all sectors of society for women with hemophilia, laying a solid financial foundation for conducting more hemophilia women's care activities in the future.

description.zh: 《携带者检测援助》项目在腾讯公益平台成功募资35,000余元的截图记录
description.en: Screenshot record of the 'Carrier Testing Assistance' project successfully raising over 35,000 yuan on Tencent Charity platform

title.zh: 微信公众号：项目启动公告
